rows.label: tlk43320242_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey. I heard it from the big man.
You're a rookie Driver, aincha?

rows.label: tlk43320242_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Anyone can see you're a rookie. But
you're still a leader, kid. That
means everyone's depending on you.

rows.label: tlk43320242_01_msg0003
rows.name: I got a piece of advice for you.

rows.label: tlk43320242_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Party leader's the one who
gets to call the shots
with the Blade Combos.

rows.label: tlk43320242_01_msg0005
rows.name:
And if you chain up those
combos, you'll get a little
boost of power each time.

rows.label: tlk43320242_01_msg0006
rows.name:
When you're the leader, the buck
stops with you. So make sure
you're giving the right orders.

rows.label: tlk43320242_01_msg0101
rows.name: I doubt I've got much to teach you.

rows.label: tlk43320242_01_msg0102
rows.name:
You should just get out there and
do your best to be good example to
all the greenhorns out there.
